# accessoryType

**Instance Property**

The accessory that the list item displays in its trailing region.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor var accessoryType: CPListItemAccessoryType { get set }
```

## Discussion

If you update the list item to display an accessory image using the [doc://com.apple.carplay/documentation/CarPlay/CPListItem/setAccessoryImage(_:)] method, CarPlay sets this property’s value to [doc://com.apple.carplay/documentation/CarPlay/CPListItemAccessoryType/none].

## Managing Accessories

- **CPListItemAccessoryType**: The accessory types that a list item can display.
- **accessoryImage**: The image that the list item displays in its trailing region.
- **setAccessoryImage(_:)**: Updates the list item’s accessory image.
